description: I am was looking for app to open and convert webp image. And this app did it easy
summary: Nice app to convert from webp

description: Best image viewer I've seen for a while, fast and lightweight. I'm viewing all my HDR collection right now
Will run for a while (5 minutes more or less) then completely kill all functions of the OS. Mouse/keyboard unresponssive. Must hold power button down to restart.
Will look at issues posted to tacentview github issues. Could not repo a crash on 22.04 / X11. Wayland not yet as stable so not using. Not sure how to respond to user feedback here.

Installed it, even though a crash was reported. Since PCmanFM wasn't showing thumbnails, I needed a workaround. Well the program works fine and solved this other issue. Conflicts might come from other software. Who knows, but for me it was well worth the risk. No problems to report.
summary: Solved PCmanFM preview and works on 22.04

description: I have been looking for an app like this app for a minute. It worked with little effort. Just click, click was all it took to do what I wanted to do. No rocket science degree was necessary. It appears to do way more. So, I am going to play around with it just to test it's limits.
il est possible de voir les image seulement une par une et seulement si elle sont sur l'ordinateur et non sur un disque amovible
